actions.text: Committee on Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sasser. With written report No. 101-429. Additional and minority views filed.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged. Pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 813.

official_title: An original bill to exclude the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund from the deficit calculation.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to exclude from deficit calculations receipts and disbursements of the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund established under the Medicare provisions of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: An original bill to exclude the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund from the deficit calculation.
